articles.title: Sunil Chhetri to lead Indian men's football team at Asian Games - ESPN - ESPN India
articles.description: Sunil Chhetri will captain the Indian men's football team at the Asian Games.
articles.content:
Sunil Chhetri will lead the Indian men's football team at the Asian Games as the All India Football Federation (AIFF) named the 17-member squad on Wednesday.
The announcement ends widespread confusi… [+2360 chars]

articles.title: Asia Cup 2023: First Time In 49 Years! India Achieve Unwanted Record Against Sri Lanka - NDTV Sports
articles.description: India recorded their second straight Super Four win in Asia Cup 2023, a prelude to the upcoming Cricket World Cup 2023, and ended Sri Lanka's 13-match winning streak in ODIs.
articles.content: The Indian cricket team batters struggled to score against the spin attack of Sri Lanka and were eventually all out for 213 during their Asia Cup 2023 Super 4 clash. Dunith Wellalage was the top perf… [+1334 chars]
